name: Quest of the Valour
description:
Developed on BlitzBasicPlus on the PC this is a game I started to write on Amiga BlitzBasic back in day and even the ZXSpectrum before that in Sinclair Basic (and a bit of machine code).

Lockdown gave me plenty of time to get the little grey cells activated again and many many apps and games were spewed forth. This is the only one so far that I feel is "polished" enough.

The game is 2D top down explore, turn based, explore dungeon, fight monsters, buy/sell type game.
